topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b1fdd86368727365610700#post_54b1fdd86368727365610700
Reminds me of joke. A very dark one.

Guy in a motorcycle. 
His jacket's zipper is busted so he wears it backwards. 
Then he looses control and CRASH! 
Passers-by witness accident and calls 117(Filipino version of 911)
"A man just had an accident and his head is backwards. Help!"
"Calm down, sir. Is the man still alive?"
"Well, he was. Until I tried to fix his head."

Not sure if translates very well.
